H3.text: what was the capital city of the east roman empire. Constantinople

A4.text: Following the collapse of the Western Roman Empire in the late 5th century, Constantinople remained the capital of the Eastern Roman Empire (also known as the Byzantine Empire; 330–1204 and 1261–1453)
